articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Nazi stickers placed on parliament offices of Clare Daly and Mick Wallace - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Officials at the European Parliament in Strasbourg are investigating after Nazi stickers were placed on the offices of Clare Daly and Mick Wallace.
articles.content:
The parliament offices of two Irish MEPs who voted against a motion condemning Russian aggression have been targeted by sinister vandals.

articles.title: Carlow medical student Racheal Diyaolu still in Ukraine after car came under fire from Russian forces - Independent.ie
articles.description: Carlow student Rachael Diyaolu and the group she is travelling with are still in Ukraine and hope to reach a European border tomorrow.
articles.content:

articles.author: From CNN's Beijing bureau
articles.title: Xi says China is willing to play role in mediating Ukraine crisis, in call with European leaders - CNN
articles.description: President Xi Jinping said Tuesday that China is willing to "work actively" with the international community to mediate the war in Ukraine, but did not offer details and reiterated his opposition to Western sanctions against Russia.
